mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, P.pno, P.pregdate, P.pname, P.pdetail, P.uno, U.uname, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P LEFT JOIN Label L ON P.lno = L.lno LEFT JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN ProjectMemberStat S ON S.pno = P.pno GROUP BY P.pno ORDER BY rownum DESC LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{rowsPerPage}

SELECT pno, pname, pdetail, pdata, pregdate, pduedate, U.uname, UPPER(SUBSTRING(U.uemail,1,1)) AS theFirstLetterOfEmail, CB.CODE_NAME AS profileBgColor, CA.CODE_NAME AS udepartment, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P LEFT JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN Label L ON P.lno = L.lno LEFT JOIN CodeTable CA ON CA.CODE_TYPE='002' AND CA.CODE=U.udepartment LEFT JOIN CodeTable CB ON CB.CODE_TYPE='007' AND CB.CODE=U.profileBgColor WHERE pno=#{pno}
mapper.update: UPDATE Project SET pname = #{pname}, pdetail = #{pdetail}, pdata=#{pdata}, pregdate=curdate(), pduedate=#{pduedate}, pamount=#{pamount} WHERE pno = #{pno}
mapper.select: select uname, uphoneno, C.CODE_NAME AS udepartment, uemail from User U, CodeTable C where uno=#{uno} AND C.CODE_TYPE='002' AND C.CODE=U.udepartment
SELECT uno, uname, uphoneno, udepartment, uemail FROM User
SELECT pno, p.uno, stat, uname FROM ProjectMemberStat p JOIN User u ON p.uno = u.uno WHERE pno = #{pno}
select CODE_TYPE, CODE, CODE_NAME from CodeTable where CODE_TYPE=#{CODE_TYPE}
select uno, uname, uphoneno, udepartment, uemail from User where uname like '%' #{uname} '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Milestones WHERE pno=#{pno} AND mstatement=001

SELECT U.uname, S.stat, CA.CODE_NAME, UPPER(SUBSTRING(U.uemail,1,1)) AS theFirstLetterOfEmail, CB.CODE_NAME AS profileBgColor FROM ProjectMemberStat S LEFT JOIN User U ON S.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN CodeTable CA ON S.stat=CA.CODE AND CA.CODE_TYPE='010' LEFT JOIN CodeTable CB ON CB.CODE_TYPE='007' AND CB.CODE = U.profileBgColor WHERE S.pno=#{pno}

SELECT 'Milestone' AS tableName, M.mtitle AS title, U.uname, M.mregdate AS regdate FROM Milestones M, User U WHERE M.pno=#{pno} AND M.uno = U.uno UNION ALL SELECT 'Issue' AS tableName, I.ititle AS title, U.uname, I.iregdate AS regdate FROM Issues I, User U WHERE I.pno=#{pno} AND I.uno = U.uno ORDER BY regdate DESC
